display.title: Block Variations
description: Blocks as far as the eye can see!
<task task="2468CAEE0E3DFE45" quest="Blocks as Far as the Eye Can See"/>
There are plenty of options of blocks to build with, with options from not only Chisel, Chipped and Chisels n Bits, but also from Blockus, Architect's Palette, and other cool mods!

subtitle.text: Blocks as far as the eye can see!
